org.jruyi.core

Interface ITextLineFilterBuilder


  • public interface ITextLineFilterBuilder
    A builder to build a textline filter.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFilter<?,?> build()
      Returns a new text line filter.
      ITextLineFilterBuilder charset(java.lang.String charset)
      Sets the charset to interpret the line terminator.
      ITextLineFilterBuilder lineTerminator(LineTerminator lineTerminator)
      Sets the line terminator.

    • Method Detail

      • charset

        ITextLineFilterBuilder charset(java.lang.String charset)
        Sets the charset to interpret the line terminator. Default is "UTF-8".
        Parameters:
        charset - the charset to encode the line terminator
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified charset is null or empty

      • lineTerminator

        ITextLineFilterBuilder lineTerminator(LineTerminator lineTerminator)
        Sets the line terminator. Default is LineTerminator.CRLF.
        Parameters:
        lineTerminator - the terminator of a text line to set
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified lineTerminator is null

      • build

        IFilter<?,?> build()
        Returns a new text line filter.
        Returns:
        a new text line filter
